articles.description: Real Madrid continued to be linked with a move for Mbappe, whilst Manchester City are running the rule over Haaland, with Barcelona unlikely to complete a deal for either.
articles.content:
Barcelona defender Dani Alves has said he rates Paris Saint-Germain forward Kylian Mbappe much higher than Borussia Dortmund's prolific goal machine Erling Haaland.

articles.author: Isabel Baldwin
articles.title: Man United: Alphonso Davies claims Cristiano Ronaldo should be captain over Harry Maguire - Daily Mail
articles.description: Maguire has faced heavy criticism for his below-par displays at Old Trafford this season. He has made a number of high-profile mistakes in what has been a tumultuous season for the Red Devils.
articles.content:
Bayern Munich star Alphonso Davies could not believe that Harry Maguire got the Manchester United captain's armband over Cristiano Ronaldo.

articles.title: Steven Gerrard insists that winning silverware at Tottenham would mean more to Harry Kane - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kane initially told Spurs he wanted to leave but City's attempts to sign him ended in failure and the England skipper has scored 33 goals for club and country this term.
articles.content:
Harry Kane can find happiness at Tottenham rather than needing a career quick fix, according to Aston Villa boss Steven Gerrard.

articles.author: Dan Sales, James Robinson
articles.title: Three-time Wimbledon champion Boris Becker found guilty of four charges under the Insolvency Act - Daily Mail
articles.description: Wimbledon champ Boris Becker has been found guilty at Southwark Crown Court of four charges under the Insolvency Act and acquitted of a further 20 counts relating to his 2017 bankruptcy.
articles.content:
Three-time Wimbledon champion Boris Becker is facing a prison sentence of up to seven years after today being found guilty of breaking UK insolvency laws.
